data.description: Specifications for paper stock, labels, etc.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is FNI - frequently needed information - and I thought writing
    this module would be a nice thing to do.

    This type of information does exist in some modules here and there
    that might need to know about paper sizes or print labels. As well,
    applications like OpenOffice and gLabels have their own private
    collections of this type of info.

    This module will provide an efficient and easy to use one-stop-shop
    for paper sizes, label layouts and other print media items that I
    haven't thought of. As well it provides internal unit-conversion and
    some label position functions to unload that burden from users code.

    I have a few forms in the module already but will flesh out using
    any public data that I can find ... once API is firmed up a bit
    more.
